scripts.cli-package-linux-x64: npm run cli-build && npx pkg -c package.json --compress GZip -t node16-linux-x64 -o pkg/malloy-cli-linux-x64 dist/cli/malloy-cli.js
scripts.cli-package-mac-arm64: npm run cli-build && npx pkg -c package.json --compress GZip -t node16-macos-arm64 -o pkg/malloy-cli-macos-arm64 dist/cli/malloy-cli.js
scripts.cli-package-mac-x6464: npm run cli-build && npx pkg -c package.json --compress GZip -t node16-macos-x64 -o pkg/malloy-cli-macos-x64 dist/cli/malloy-cli.js
